title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client library for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, voice).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced Node CLI for chatting, pulling, listing, and benchmarking models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot server for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for QA and generation pipelines.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in replacement for OpenAI Codex using Ollama models.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with thread support and model switching.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, generate, and embeddings APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama providing typed APIs and streaming support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.
